title: Elden Ring
about: A fantasy action RPG developed by FromSoftware, set within a world created by Hidetaka Miyazaki and George R. R. Martin. Traverse the Lands Between and assume the role of the Tarnished to become the Elden Lord.

keyFeatures.title: Vast Open World
keyFeatures.description: A seamless, interconnected world with sprawling fields and complex dungeons.

keyFeatures.title: Heroic Journey
keyFeatures.description: Unravel the mysteries of the Elden Ring and encounter foes with deep backgrounds.

keyFeatures.title: Build Variety
keyFeatures.description: Combine weapons, magic, and skills to develop your own unique playstyle.

details.tags: Action RPG, Fantasy, Open World, Difficult
details.platforms: PC, PS4, Xbox One, PS5, Xbox Series X|S

systemSpecs.Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 3GB / AMD Radeon RX 580 4GB
